txt.en: Folk tales have long spoken of werewolves stalking the night -- but now that you have met the Gauredain, you suspect you know more of the truth of these tales. If they are Men, then they are only barely so. They are greater than most Men in stature, yet hunched over and using only primitive tools and speech and often dressing in the skins of wolves.

The Gauredain seem unremittingly hostile to the Free Peoples of the West. Whether they are in league with the Dark Lord is difficult to say, but you have defeated many of them despite their unusual strength and animal-cunning.
